body:
So basically I'm making this post in frustration - every time we reserve a scrim server to play on we have to wait between 10 - 30 minutes before it opens. {tag=7105f76bb4b94fe4bbdb980962d4b7a9} today asked 2 devs for answer for why this happens, but he didn't get any good information at all. 

If avicus somehow decide to shut down the scrim servers in the following months, I guarantee that half of the players will quit, me included.
